sources.title: Tales of Halloween | Full Movie | Awesome Horror Anthology | Greg Grunberg | Movie Central
sources.description:
Tales of Halloween - Ten stories from horror's top directors. Ghosts, ghouls, monsters, and the devil delight in terrorizing unsuspecting residents of a suburban neighborhood on Halloween night.
2015.  Stars: Greg Grunberg, Adrienne Barbeau(voice), Hunter Smit, Barry Bostwick, Cameron Easton

metadata.Plot: Named "the best horror anthology since Trick 'r Treat" by Fangoria and "among the best Halloween-themed horror movies ever made" by DailyDead, this critically acclaimed film weaves together 10 chilling tales from horror's top directors. Ghosts, ghouls, monsters, and the devil delight in terrorizing unsuspecting residents of a suburban neighborhood on Halloween night.
metadata.Director: Darren Lynn Bousman, Axelle Carolyn, Adam Gierasch
metadata.Writer: Axelle Carolyn, Dave Parker, Clint Sears
metadata.Actors: Adrienne Barbeau, Hunter Smit, Cameron Easton
